dcterms:creator: E. Leurent
dcterms:description: An environment for autonomous driving decision-making, used to evaluate the safety performance of DRL models in complex road traffic junction scenarios.
dcterms:title: Highway Simulation System

dcterms:creator: P. Polack
F. Altché
B. d’Andréa Novel
A. de La Fortelle
dcterms:description: The kinematic bicycle model is used to implement a simplistic behavior for planning feasible trajectories for autonomous vehicles, particularly in intersection scenarios.
dcterms:title: Kinematic Bicycle Model
